entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
